    • メソッドの詳細

      • onSlotChange

        public void onSlotChange(ItemStack p_75220_1_,
                         ItemStack p_75220_2_)
        if par2 has more items than par1, onCrafting(item,countIncrease) is called

      • onCrafting

        protected void onCrafting(ItemStack stack,
                          int amount)
        the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood. Typically increases an internal count then calls onCrafting(item).

      • onSwapCraft

        protected void onSwapCraft(int p_190900_1_)

      • onCrafting

        protected void onCrafting(ItemStack stack)
        the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood.

      • onTake

        public ItemStack onTake(PlayerEntity thePlayer,
                        ItemStack stack)

      • isItemValid

        public boolean isItemValid(ItemStack stack)
        Check if the stack is allowed to be placed in this slot, used for armor slots as well as furnace fuel.

      • getStack

        public ItemStack getStack()
        Helper fnct to get the stack in the slot.

      • getHasStack

        public boolean getHasStack()
        Returns if this slot contains a stack.

      • putStack

        public void putStack(ItemStack stack)
        Helper method to put a stack in the slot.

      • onSlotChanged

        public void onSlotChanged()
        Called when the stack in a Slot changes

      • getSlotStackLimit

        public int getSlotStackLimit()
        Returns the maximum stack size for a given slot (usually the same as getInventoryStackLimit(), but 1 in the case of armor slots)

      • getItemStackLimit

        public int getItemStackLimit(ItemStack stack)

      • func_225517_c_

        @Nullable
public com.mojang.datafixers.util.Pair<ResourceLocation,ResourceLocation> func_225517_c_()

      • decrStackSize

        public ItemStack decrStackSize(int amount)
        Decrease the size of the stack in slot (first int arg) by the amount of the second int arg. Returns the new stack.

      • canTakeStack

        public boolean canTakeStack(PlayerEntity playerIn)
        Return whether this slot's stack can be taken from this slot.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Actualy only call when we want to render the white square effect over the slots. Return always True, except for the armor slot of the Donkey/Mule (we can't interact with the Undead and Skeleton horses)

      • getSlotIndex

        public int getSlotIndex()
        Retrieves the index in the inventory for this slot, this value should typically not be used, but can be useful for some occasions.
        戻り値:
        Index in associated inventory for this slot.

      • isSameInventory

        public boolean isSameInventory(Slot other)
        Checks if the other slot is in the same inventory, by comparing the inventory reference.
        パラメータ:
        other -
        戻り値:
        true if the other slot is in the same inventory

      • setBackground

        public Slot setBackground(ResourceLocation atlas,
                          ResourceLocation sprite)
        Sets the background atlas and sprite location.
        パラメータ:
        atlas - The atlas name
        sprite - The sprite located on that atlas.
        戻り値:
        this, to allow chaining.
